casebody.data:
PEOPLE v. LAPIDUS et al. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. May 17, 1894.) Motion by Herman Lapidus and another to vacate judgment entered on a, forfeited recognizance.

Argued before BOOKSTAVER, BISCHOFF, and PRYOR, JJ.

John R. Fellows, for the People. Brooks, O’Sullivan & Brooks, for defendants.

No opinion. Motion to remit forfeiture denied.
